verses.verse: And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Build <WH1129> me here seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and prepare <WH3559> me here seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352>.
And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> as Balaam <WH1109> had spoken <WH1696>; and Balak <WH1111> and Balaam <WH1109> offered <WH5927> on every altar <WH4196> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352>.

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Stand <WH3320> by thy burnt-offering <WH5930>, and I will go <WH3212>: peradventure Jehovah <WH3068> will come <WH7136> to meet <WH7125> me <WH1697>; and whatsoever he showeth <WH7200> me I will tell <WH5046> thee <WH3212>. And he went to a bare height <WH8205>.

And God <WH430> met <WH7136> Balaam <WH1109>: and he said <WH559> unto him <WH6186>, I have prepared the seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and I have offered <WH5927> up a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar <WH4196>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> put <WH7760> a word <WH1697> in Balaam <WH1109>'s mouth <WH6310>, and said <WH559>, Return <WH7725> unto Balak <WH1111>, and thus thou shalt speak <WH1696>.
And he returned <WH7725> unto him <WH5324>, and, lo, he was standing by his burnt-offering <WH5930>, he <WH8269>, and all the princes of Moab <WH4124>.

And he took up <WH5375> his parable <WH4912>, and said <WH559>, From Aram <WH758> hath Balak <WH1111> brought <WH5148> me <WH4428>, The king of Moab <WH4124> from the mountains <WH2042> of the East <WH6924>: Come <WH3212>, curse <WH779> me Jacob <WH3290>, And come <WH3212>, defy <WH2194> Israel <WH3478>.
How <WH4100> shall I curse <WH5344>, whom God <WH410> hath not cursed <WH6895>? And how shall I defy <WH2194>, whom Jehovah <WH3068> hath not defied <WH2194>?

For from the top <WH7218> of the rocks <WH6697> I see <WH7200> him <WH1389>, And from the hills I behold <WH7789> him <WH5971>: lo, it is a people that dwelleth <WH7931> alone <WH910>, And shall not be reckoned <WH2803> among the nations <WH1471>.

Who can count <WH4487> the dust <WH6083> of Jacob <WH3290>, Or number <WH4557> the fourth <WH7255> part of Israel <WH3478>? Let me die <WH4191> the death <WH4194> of the righteous <WH3477>, And let my last end be like his <WH319>!

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto Balaam <WH1109>, What hast thou done <WH6213> unto me <WH3947>? I took thee to curse <WH6895> mine enemies <WH341>, and <WH1288>, behold, thou hast blessed them altogether <WH1288>.
And he answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, Must I not take heed <WH8104> to speak <WH1696> that which Jehovah <WH3068> putteth <WH7760> in my mouth <WH6310>?

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto him <WH3212>, Come, I pray thee <WH312>, with me unto another place <WH4725>, from whence thou mayest see <WH7200> them <WH7200>; thou shalt see but <WH657> the utmost <WH7097> part of them <WH7200>, and shalt not see them all <WH6895>: and curse me them from thence.

And he took <WH3947> him into the field <WH7704> of Zophim <WH6839>, to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah <WH6449>, and built <WH1129> seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and offered <WH5927> up a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar <WH4196>.
And he said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Stand <WH3320> here <WH3541> by thy burnt-offering <WH5930>, while I meet <WH7136> Jehovah yonder <WH3541>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> met <WH7136> Balaam <WH1109>, and put <WH7760> a word <WH1697> in his mouth <WH6310>, and said <WH559>, Return <WH7725> unto Balak <WH1111>, and thus shalt thou speak <WH1696>.

And he came <WH935> to him <WH5324>, and, lo, he was standing by his burnt-offering <WH5930>, and the princes <WH8269> of Moab <WH4124> with him <WH1111>. And Balak said <WH559> unto him <WH3068>, What hath Jehovah spoken <WH1696>?
And he took up <WH5375> his parable <WH4912>, and said <WH559>, Rise up <WH6965>, Balak <WH1111>, and hear <WH8085>; Hearken <WH238> unto me <WH1121>, thou son of Zippor <WH6834>:

God <WH410> is not a man <WH376>, that he should lie <WH3576>, Neither the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, that he should repent <WH5162>: Hath he said <WH559>, and will he not do <WH6213> it <WH1696>? Or hath he spoken, and will he not make it good <WH6965>?
Behold <WH3947>, I have received commandment to bless <WH1288>: And he hath blessed <WH1288>, and I cannot reverse it <WH7725>.

He hath not beheld <WH5027> iniquity <WH205> in Jacob <WH3290>; Neither hath he seen <WH7200> perverseness <WH5999> in Israel <WH3478>: Jehovah <WH3068> his God <WH430> is with him <WH8643>, And the shout of a king is among them <WH4428>.
God <WH410> bringeth them forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>; He hath as it were the strength <WH8443> of the wild-ox <WH7214>.

Surely there is no enchantment <WH5173> with Jacob <WH3290>; Neither is there any divination <WH7081> with Israel <WH3478>: Now <WH6256> shalt it be said <WH559> of Jacob <WH3290> and of Israel <WH3478>, What hath God <WH410> wrought <WH6466>!

Behold <WH5971>, the people riseth up <WH6965> as a lioness <WH3833>, And as a lion <WH3833> doth he lift himself up <WH5375>: He shall not lie down <WH7901> until he eat <WH398> of the prey <WH2964>, And drink <WH8354> the blood <WH1818> of the slain <WH2491>.
And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto Balaam <WH1109>, Neither curse <WH5344> them at all <WH6895>, nor bless <WH1288> them at all <WH1288>.
But Balaam <WH1109> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Told <WH1696> not I thee <WH559>, saying, All that Jehovah <WH3068> speaketh <WH1696>, that I must do <WH6213>?

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto Balaam <WH1109>, Come <WH3212> now <WH3947>, I will take thee unto another <WH312> place <WH4725>; peradventure it will please <WH3474> God <WH430> that thou mayest curse me them from thence <WH6895>.
And Balak <WH1111> took <WH3947> Balaam <WH1109> unto the top <WH7218> of Peor <WH6465>, that looketh <WH8259> down <WH6440> upon the desert <WH3452>.

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Build <WH1129> me here seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and prepare <WH3559> me here seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352>.
And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> as Balaam <WH1109> had said <WH559>, and offered <WH5927> up a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar <WH4196>.
